entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Vaughan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:13 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: E 18 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
